mapper.insert: insert into review(num, title, u_id, content,origin,hotelname,rating,review_img) values (review_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{u_id}, #{content},review_seq.nextval,#{hotelname},#{rating},#{review_img})
mapper.select: select num,title,content,writedate,origin,groupnum,hotelname from review order by origin desc,groupnum asc
